sections.heading: General applicabilityExcept as otherwise specified in any Title of this Code, the provisions of the Children's Code shall be applicable in all juvenile court proceedings, and only to such proceedings
sections.text: Acts 1991, No. 235, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1992; Acts 1992, No. 705, ยง1, eff. July 6, 1992.
